// Rock The Upgrades - Custom Upgrades
//
// This file is referenced by the plugin and overrides the default provided
// upgrades options.
//
// The base file was generated by [TODO]
//
// Applicable attributes may be discovered from the attributes section in:
//   "[gamedir]/tf/scripts/items/items_game.txt"
//
// For the most part the file provides the default upgrades
// selection with the following changes:
//   Sniper Explosive Headshot - Reduced from 3 steps to 1 (for balance)
//   Ammo Regen - Added
//   Sentry Range - Added
//   Melee Range Multiplier - Enabled
//
// IMPORTANT: File Locations
//   Server: "[gamedir]/tf/scripts/items/bangerz_upgrades.txt"
//   Client: "[gamedir]/tf/download/scripts/items/bangerz_upgrades.txt"
//
// NOTE: Adding an upgrade to "ItemUpgrades" makes it available to all weapons
//       determined eligible by the underlying upgrades system

"upgrades"
{
        // NOTE: using the same upgrade in items and player can stack the effect
        "ItemUpgrades"
        {
                "1.1"
                {
                        // Damage - Normal
                        "attribute"     "damage bonus"          // attrib to hook
                        "icon"          "achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_with_directpipe"
                        "increment"     "0.25"                          // percent
                        "cap"           "2.0"                           // percent
                        "cost"          "400"                           // first tier points/credits cost
                }
                "1.2"
                {
                        // Damage - Low
                        "attribute"     "damage bonus"
                        "icon"          "achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_with_directpipe"
                        "increment"     "0.2"
                        "cap"           "1.8"
                        "cost"          "500"
                        "quality"       "1"                                     // allows varying usage cases without cloning attributes
                                                                                        // 1 = low, 2 = normal (default), 3 = high
                }
                "1.3"
                {
                        // Fire Speed - Normal
                        "attribute"     "fire rate bonus"       // attrib to hook

                        "cap"           "0.6"                           // percent
                        "cost"          "200"                           // first tier points/credits cost

        // PLAYER UPGRADES
        // Attributes generated by these will be attached to the player.
        "PlayerUpgrades"
        {
                "1"
                {
                        "attribute"     "dmg taken from fire reduced"
                        "icon"          "mvm/upgradeicons/upgrade_resistance_fire"
                        "increment"     "-0.20"                 // 15% reduction
                        "cap"           "0.40"                  // 75% reduction max (.41 because of float rounding when comparing)
                        "cost"          "300"
                }
                "2"
                {
                        "attribute"     "dmg taken from blast reduced"
                        "icon"          "achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_heavies_fullhp_onedet"
                        "increment"     "-0.20"
                        "cap"           "0.40"
                        "cost"          "300"
                }
                "3"
                {
                        "attribute"     "dmg taken from bullets reduced"

                {
